data.name: Notification_RefreshNotAvailable
data.value: [KpRefresher] KillProof.me refresh was not available Please retry later.

data.name: MainWindow_EnableAutoRetry_Tooltip
data.value: Schedule automatically a new try when KillProof.me was not available for a refresh

data.name: MainWindow_EnableRefreshOnKill_Tooltip
data.value: Only allow refresh if a clear was made and is visible by GW2 API

data.name: Notification_RefreshNotAvailableRetry
data.value: [KpRefresher] KillProof.me refresh was not available\nAuto-retry in 5 minutes.

data.name: Notification_TryScheduled
data.value: {0} A new try has been scheduled.

data.name: Notiication_InstanceExitDetected
data.value: [KpRefresher] Instance exit detected, refresh scheduled in {0} minute{1}

data.name: Notification_DataNotAvailable
data.value: [KpRefresher] KillProof.me data not available Please retry later.

data.name: MainWindow_Button_ShowClears_Tooltip
data.value:
Displays current raid clears according to KillProof.me and GW2
If the color is green, it means the clear has been registered on KillProof.me If the color is purple, it means that the clear is visible by GW2 API, and can be added to KillProof.me through refresh

data.name: MainWindow_RefreshOnMapChange_Tooltip
data.value: Schedule a refresh when leaving a raid or strike map

data.name: MainWindow_RefreshOnKillOnlyBoss_Tooltip
data.value: Only refresh if a final raid wing boss was cleared (e.g. Sabetha)

data.name: Notification_AccountNameFetchError
data.value: [KpRefresher] Error while getting Account name from GW2 API. Please retry later.

data.name: MainWindow_Button_RefreshLinkedAccounts_Tooltip
data.value: Attempts to refresh all linked KillProof.me accounts

data.name: Notification_NoClearRefreshAborted
data.value: [KpRefresher] No new clear validating settings, refresh aborted!

data.name: MainWindow_Button_Refresh_Tooltip
data.value: Attempts to refresh KillProof.me If auto-retry is enable, a new refresh will be scheduled in case of failure

data.name: Notification_KpAccountAnonymous
data.value: [KpRefresher] Refresh failed : please allow anonymous refresh in your KillProof.me settings

data.name: MainWindow_ShowScheduleNotification_Tooltip
data.value: Display notification when retry is scheduled

data.name: MainWindow_DelayBeforeRefreshOnMapChange_Tooltip
data.value: Time in minutes before refresh is triggered after map change (between 1 and 60)

data.name: Notification_KPProfileFetchError
data.value: [KpRefresher] Error while loading KillProof.me profile. Please retry later.

data.name: Notification_NotifyScheduled
data.value: [KpRefresher] You will be notified when next refresh is available, in approx. {0} minute{1}.

data.name: MainWindow_Button_ShowKP_Tooltip
data.value: Scan your bank, shared slots and characters and displays current KP according GW2 API. Every kp in the list is able to be scanned by KillProof.me, if not already scanned. You can use this feature to check if a newly opened chest is already visible for KillProof.me.
